{"id":896748059,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1676231400,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"195 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/896748059/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Integers by The Power Value","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int procedure(int x) {\n        int operations = 0;\n        while(x != 1) {\n            if(x % 2 == 0) {\n                x /= 2;\n                operations++;\n            }\n            else {\n            x = x * 3 + 1;\n            operations++;\n            }        \n        }\n        return operations;\n    }\n    \n    int getKth(int lo, int hi, int k) {\n        vector<int> ans;\n        for (int i = lo; i <= hi; i++) ans.push_back(i);\n        sort(ans.begin(), ans.end(), [&](int a, int b) {\n            int p1 = procedure(a), p2 = procedure(b);\n            return p1 == p2 ? a < b : p1 < p2;\n        });\n\n        \n        \n        return ans[k-1];\n    } \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-integers-by-the-power-value","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
